definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
just at (that time)/right in (that place)/right in the middle of (doing sth)
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
just (in time)/just right/just enough/to happen to/to chance to/by chance/it just so happens that

sentences.english: Further eytogenetic analysis and breeding utilization of this intergeneric hybrid are still being carried out.
sentences.chinese: 目前正进一步开展细胞遗传和育种利用研究。

sentences.english: It was in this context that international support and scrutiny were critical.
sentences.chinese: 正因为是在这种情况下，国际援助和监督才很重要。

sentences.english: The guy in blue told me they were teasing the silk.
sentences.chinese: 穿蓝衣的这位老哥告诉我他们正梳理的是Silk。

sentences.english: And as he prayed, the fashion of his countenance was altered, and his raiment was white and glistering.
sentences.chinese: 正祷告的时候，他的面貌就改变了，衣服洁白放光。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the expression of MMP9 in tumor tissues was positively associated with the MVD val-ue.
sentences.chinese: 肿瘤组织中MMP9的表达与微血管密度呈正相关。

sentences.english: Xie Jianxian, You should also think of yourimmolation, Chong Lou prepares to kick you out the game.
sentences.chinese: 邪剑仙，你也该想想自己，重楼正预备把你踢出游戏。

sentences.english: The children were sitting round the table.
A frend is going to visit a girl you know well.
sentences.chinese: 一个朋友正准备去看望你很熟悉的一个女孩子。

sentences.english: He is waiting to find out if the courts will accept his case.
sentences.chinese: 他正等着看法院是否会受理此案。

sentences.english: The table was set for lunch, and the coffee was boiling on the black iron stove.
sentences.chinese: 午餐桌已备好，黑铁炉上正煮着咖啡。

sentences.english: That is because Malian government forces are fighting against rebels .
sentences.chinese: 这是因为马里政府部队正对抗叛军。

sentences.english: Now the "angry river" is under a dual-threat from both soil erosion and a new dam project.
sentences.chinese: 怒江正面临着水土流失和新建大坝的双重威胁。

sentences.english: In inner silence, we experience who we really are.
sentences.chinese: 内心静默时，我们正体验着我们真正是谁。

sentences.english: With the development of detective methods, the concept of transdifferentiation is being accepted by people.
sentences.chinese: 随着检测手段的进步，转分化正逐渐被人们认同。

sentences.english: This is in addition to the seven villages that have now been remediated.
sentences.chinese: 这一数字不包括现在正采取整治措施的七个村庄。

sentences.english: And right in-between thinking and doing, I would say, there is experience.
sentences.chinese: 正处于思想和行为之间的，我会说，是经验。

definition: just at (that time)/right in (that place)/right in the middle of (doing sth)
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
to be in (some state, position, or condition)
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
to be situated at/to find oneself at
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
just at the time of/honest/upright/(math.) positive value
flourishing and still in the ascendant (idiom); rapidly expanding/still growing strong/on the up
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
